response.job_title: Manager | Operations Director | Project Director | Project Manager | PV | MBA | Electric Engineer | Energy
response.summary: Bilingual Electrical Engineer, MBA from the University of Los Andes and candidate for PMP certification from the PMI, with focus on managing high-performance teams to improve key performance indicators in the areas of sales, operations, projects, and human resources. Extensive experience in sales, as well as in the management and direction of energy efficiency projects and renewable energy systems. Recognized for leadership skills, resilience, teamwork, resourcefulness, goal orientation, and empathy.
response.skills: Ingeniería, Gestión de proyectos, Formación, Energía solar, Solar PV, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Liderazgo, Microsoft Office, Team Leadership, Liderazgo de equipos, Administración y dirección de empresas, Gestión de programas, Cambio organizacional

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the management and direction of the regional office in the central zone of Colombia (Bogotá, Cundinamarca, Tolima, Huila, Boyacá, Meta, Casanare, and ZNI), in terms of administration, human resources, sales, operations, and projects.

o	Establishment and tracking of sales targets and monthly and annual sales projections. In 2022, 
        sales over 24,000 million Colombian pesos.
o	Management of EPC photovoltaic projects, E mobility and O&M projetcs. In 2022 we designed 
        and built more than 5 MWp.
o	Oversight of regional operations, including income and expense control, breakeven point, and 
        profitability.
o	Implementation of strategies to increase administrative and operational efficiency.
o	Direct management of three leaders and indirect supervision of over 60 employees
profile_positions.title: Regional Manager

profile_positions.description: Structure of the photovoltaic solar division within the company, as well as responsible for the implementation of processes and procedures for the design and construction of renewable energy and energy efficiency projects
profile_positions.title: Operations Director

profile_positions.description: Direction of planning and implementation activities for all the PV projects of the company in Colombia (32.7 MWp designed y 5.15 MWp built).
profile_positions.title: Operations Director

profile_positions.description: Desing and construction coordination for all PV projects in Colombia (29 MWp designed y 254.85 kWp built).
profile_positions.title: Technical Leader

profile_positions.description: Development of O&M documentation of electrical equipment in crude oil collection centers and electrical substations.
profile_positions.title: Associate Engineer

education.degree_name: International Exchange program - Master Energy Conversion and Management

company.name: Erco Energía
company.description:
Contamos con un portafolio de soluciones y servicios que impactan la cadena completa de la energía, como la construcción de proyectos de energía solar, de infraestructura de carga para movilidad eléctrica y de almacenamiento de energía. Además, generamos energía a través de plantas propias, que a su vez operamos y mantenemos, para finalmente, comercializar energía a usuarios finales por medio del primer comercializador de energía digital de Latinoamérica.

Así, hemos logrado crear una empresa de energía digital que a través de un servicio increíble nos permite cambiar la forma en que las personas y empresas producen y consumen energía.
